name: Savior Updated 2/09/16
description:
Savior is a retro-styled, Action, Platformer, Shooter. While this game is being developed, I hope to hear some feedback on what could be improved and what you would like to see, as well as if there are any bugs or problems within the game.

This is currently being developed by 1 person. Everything you see here is not final and is subject to change.

Please tell me what you think and give it a try! Have fun!

Send comments, suggestions, feedback of any kind to:

saviordevelopment@gmail.com

Directions/Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

Space bar to shoot

Tab is the action key

Escape to close the game

2/09/16 Update!

Added:

AIR 2 and AIR 3 Bosses, now playable with complete stages!

Tab is now going to be the action key, allowing you to access doors as you stand on top of them.

Coming:

AIR 4 Boss and stage

Weapon power ups

Dialogue text before fighting
